Why waste time typing out long URLs or sifting through bookmarks? With Address Bar Shortcuts, you're just a couple of keystrokes away from your favorite sites.

Enhance your productivity with our browser extension that turns your address bar into a powerful tool for quick navigation. By creating simple keyword shortcuts for your frequently visited sites, you can access them instantly, saving time and streamlining your online workflow.

ðŸŒŸ How to Use

1. Create a Shortcut: Decide on a keyword and link it to your desired URL. (e.g., "fb" for Facebook.com).
2. Launch Site: Type your shortcut into the address bar, and hit Enter.

ðŸš€ Key Features

- Custom Shortcuts: Easily assign keywords to your most-visited websites 
- Instant Access: Simply type your shortcut into the address bar and press Enter to be redirected immediately.
- Privacy-Focused: Operates entirely on your local device with zero data transmission to ensure your privacy is maintained.

By eliminating the need to navigate through bookmarks or type lengthy URLs, our extension offers a quicker, reliable, and user-friendly web experience right from your browser's address bar.
